---
title: "Diamonds Plot"
format: html
---

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| label: setup
#| message: false
#| warning: false
library(ggplot2)

# Show current date and time
cat("Report generated on:", Sys.Date() |> as.character(), "")
#| label: diamonds-plot
#| fig-cap: "Carat vs Price (diamonds dataset)"
ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price, color = cut)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5) +
  labs(title = "Diamonds: Carat vs Price by Cut")
```
